LanguageData.NRI.defaultOptionTT: What added factions from new mods should use as a default value.
LanguageData.NRI.overrideRestrictionsTT: This will remove all restrictions from this faction regarding Ideologies
LanguageData.NRI.percentChance: 'Generated OR Saved' has a {0} chance of generating an ideology
LanguageData.NRI.percentChanceTT: If using the Random OR Saved option, this is the chance of generating an ideology instead of selecting a saved one.
LanguageData.NRI.useRandomOrSavedTT: Will choose between a saved and a generated with a {} chance of generating an ideology.
LanguageData.NRI.useRandomSavedTT: Will choose a random saved Ideology when generating the faction
LanguageData.NRI.useGeneratedTT: Will use the vanilla ideology behavior when generating the faction
LanguageData.NRI.activeGame: Preferred ideologies per faction can only be defined with an active game due to how ideologies are loaded
LanguageData.NRI.fixedIdeo: Faction has a fixed ideology defined
